des: "This is a comforting way to start your morning. Made with protein-rich soy milk and topped with walnuts, it's a superfoods tour-de-force that will fill you up and satisfy that morning sweets craving. Note: this recipe is for a single serving. For a milder flavor sub in clover honey for the avocado honey."
ins: Stir the oats, soy milk, pumpkin puree, and cinnamon together in a saucepan; bring to a gentle boil. Reduce heat to low and simmer 5 minutes, or until the oatmeal reaches your desired consistency. Transfer to serving bowl. Garnish with walnuts and honey.
